short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts the page text to bionic text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bionic Reading is a revolutionary way for guiding the eyes through text using fixation spots to make reading easier. As a result, the reader's attention is drawn solely to the highlighted starting letters, leaving the word to be completed by the brain.
